info.de: Wird angezeigt, wenn ein Link in den sozialen Medien geteilt wird. [Mehr Infos](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) über Bild-Miniaturansichten.
info.he: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.
info.es: Aparece cuando se comparte un enlace en una red social. [Más información](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) acerca de las miniaturas
info.fr: Affichée lorsqu'un lien est partagé sur les réseaux sociaux. [En savoir plus](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sur les images miniatures.
info.it: Mostrata quando si condivide un link sui social media. [Maggiori informazioni](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sulle immagini di anteprima.
info.ja: SNSでリンクがシェアされると表示されます。[詳細情報](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)画像のサムネイルについては、上のリンクを参照してください。
info.pt-BR: Apresentada ao compartilhar um link nas redes sociais. [Saiba mais](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sobre miniaturas de imagens.
info.en: מוצג בעת הוספה של קישור מרשת חברתית [למד עוד](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/).
